tool_description: Generates comprehensive load combinations for structural analysis according to building codes, combining dead, live, wind, seismic, and other loads with appropriate load factors.

dead_load.description: Dead load magnitude in kN or lbs

live_load.description: Live load magnitude in kN or lbs

wind_load.description: Wind load magnitude in kN or lbs

seismic_load.description: Seismic load magnitude in kN or lbs

building_code.description: Building code standard (ASCE7, IBC, AISC, ACI318, Eurocode)

load_combination_type.description: Type of load combination (LRFD, ASD, ultimate, service)

error_messages: Invalid load values: All load values must be non-negative numbers
Unsupported building code: Use one of [ASCE7, IBC, AISC, ACI318, Eurocode]
Invalid load combination type: Use one of [LRFD, ASD, ultimate, service]
Missing required loads: Dead load and live load are mandatory
usage: Provide dead_load, live_load, and building_code. Optionally specify wind_load, seismic_load, and load_combination_type. The tool returns all applicable load combinations with their factors.

critical_combination.description: Description of the governing load combination

max_factored_load.description: Maximum factored load from all combinations

load_factors.description: Load factors applied to each load type

combination_names.description: Names of all generated load combinations
